catchHighlight: A pentester's team workflow enhancer that's:

more.title: Reliability & Excellence
more.desc: Voron offers a platform for service providers to test deployed defenses and processes to ensure the sustainability of the system, through the missions to infiltrate corporate networks.

more.title: Comprehensive Reporting
more.desc: Voron provides a comprehensive report detailing our findings which includes detailed analysis of detected vulnerabilities and potential risk factors at the end of every test.

more.title: Adherence to Rules of Engagement
more.desc: In all our endeavors, we follow established rules of engagement, confirming our operations are within the authorized scope and do not infrace upon any contractual or legal boundaries.
